author: @pdpbasak
text: If someone is guessing why Krish equated both the equations to 0:- In very simple terms, the slope of the curve wrt the loss function at the optimal values of beta will be close to 0 because at the optimal values the loss itself is close to 0 (the bottom most point of the gradient descent curve)
